thread.title: Taco Charlton says he's a top 15 pick, but he's also talked plenty with the Lions
thread.title_full: Taco Charlton says he's a top 15 pick, but he's also talked plenty with the Lions

author: Nick Baumgardner | nbaumgardner@mlive.com
title: Taco Charlton says he's a top 15 pick, but he's also talked plenty with the Lions
text: ANN ARBOR -- Taco Charlton believes he's one of the most talented players in the 2017 NFL Draft. Just ask him. "I think I'm definitely a top 15 guy," Charlton says. "I feel like I'm only going to get better...
